alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 7:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL FLAGLER AND SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOHNS COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM EDT... At 735 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hastings, moving east at 15 mph. Another storm was just west of St Augustine moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine Beach, Marineland, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, Spuds, Dupont Center, and Elkton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
